properties.entry: The value is not a number.
The value does not have the required length.
The value does not match the required format.
The value is not of the correct type.
The new parent category cannot be the same category.
The new category parents cannot include this category.
The startDate value cannot be on or before the epoch.
The startDate value cannot be on or after the epoch end.
The startDate value cannot be on or before 1000-01-01 00:00:00
The startDate value cannot be on or after 9999-12-31 23:59:59.
The endDate value cannot be on or after the epoch end.
The endDate value cannot be before the startDate value.
The endDate value cannot be on or after 9999-12-31 23:59:59.
The Item Definition must have a default type.
